summary:
Secure DeFi Infrastructure - UNCX Network is a leading provider of decentralized finance services. Thousands of investors and projects rely on our certified & secured technology to participate in DeFi safely.

 Partnerships - UNCX Network is proud to work with top security and technology experts to build decentralized technology with a focus on security.

 Founders - UNCX Network was started by two people in June 2020 with no outside funding or investment. Today it employs a large team of industry experts.
